To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.
   

  

 Join us today to build Wolt together.

title: Business Architect at SEB Corporate & Private Customers (C&PC) at SEB in Stockholm
description:
SEB Corporate & Private Customers (C&PC) provides all financial services to small and medium-sized companies as well as private individuals in Sweden. This department gives access to the bank's total financial service offering via SEB's digital channels, telephone, and SEB branch offices. The division is undergoing a strong digitalization transformation of both business models and technical platforms.
   

  

 Do you want to join us in improving our corporate memory and structure capital by building sustainable Business Architecture? Are you passionate about improving offerings and solutions by setting the direction? If yes, then this is the job for you.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 As a Business Architect at C&PC you will, together with the team, secure our architectural models, our processes and solutions in both business planning and domain planning. You will perform transformation analysis of business strategies to recommend on where to develop and transform. You will also be involved in in early business analysis of group common transformations, to suggest most suitable set up and involvement for further implementation in the division.
   

  

 In your daily work you will collaborate with colleagues in the C&PC CIO function, as well as colleagues from the rest of the division. You will also collaborate with architects within SEB group and many other roles within the organization.
   

  

**Candidate profile**
* You are a certified business architect and have an analytic mindset.
* You have experience of all elements of business architecture and agile way of working.
* If you have experience from working with Aris and Cordials business architectural tools or similar, it will be useful
* Knowledge of the end customer, private and corporate customers, is essential
* You have a holistic perspective as well as an understanding of the importance of details
* You are pragmatic and comfortable when working in different set ups
* You are a good listener, communicator and a team player
* You see change as an opportunity to improve
* Networking comes naturally to you
* Insights in new technology as enablers for new business models are valued
* You have an academic education, and you are fluent in written & spoken Swedish and English


**Ready to join?**
 Are you interested in joining our team? Attach your CV and a short personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to the CIO function at C&PC. Send in your application no later than 7th of January, 2025. If you have questions about the position, please contact hiring manager Emma Spjuth, Emma.Spjuth@seb.se

title: Driftplanerare av centrala system hos Alecta
description:
**Vill du driva produktionsplanering och releasehantering för kritiska system? Hos Alecta får du bidra till samhällets trygghet!**
 Som driftplanerare hos Alecta i Stockholm har du en central roll i att säkerställa IT driftsäkerheten för våra viktigaste system. Här får du chansen att bidra till något större – en samhällsviktig funktion där du gör skillnad varje dag. Vi värdesätter långsiktighet, kvalitet och individens utveckling, vilket gör att du får både trygghet och utmaningar i ditt arbete. Dessutom erbjuder vi flexibilitet och balans med möjlighet till distansarbete och moderna lokaler i centrala Stockholm. Här möts du av en dynamisk, hjälpsam atmosfär som erbjuder både teknisk komplexitet och närhet till beslut!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig**
* Ett meningsfullt arbete där du bidrar till att hålla våra kritiska IT system igång, något som är avgörande för både kollegor och kunder
* Samhällsviktigt uppdrag där du hjälper Alectas kunder att trygga sin ekonomiska framtid
* Goda utvecklingsmöjligheter med fokus på individutveckling och självledarskap, där du får växa både personligt och professionellt
* Generösa förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag, lunchsubvention, förkortad sommararbetstid och tillgång till träningslokaler
* Möjlighet att effektivisera och digitalisera våra processer
* En trygg och stabil arbetsplats där långsiktighet och kvalitet genomsyrar allt arbete


**Det här gör du hos oss**
 I Rollen Som Produktionsplanerare Är Du Med Och Säkerställer Driften Av Våra Centrala System. Dina Huvudsakliga Uppgifter Inkluderar
   

  

* Planering och uppföljning av nattliga körningar
* koordinera incidenter och avvikelser, i samarbete med både interna team och vår driftsleverantör
* Arbetsleda en grupp på ca 10 personer som hjälps åt med incidentansvaret
* Arbeta med långsiktiga planer, exempelvis för årsskifteskörningar och bemanningsplaner


**Ditt team och arbetsplats**
 Du blir en del av ett team där ni alla samarbetar kring produktionsplaneringen. Teamet har ett övergripande ansvar för att samordna arbetet och bemanna arbetsschemat. Teamets mål är att tillhandahålla en stabil produktionsmiljö för Alectas kunder och interna användare. Du tillhör Alectas IT-avdelningen, som består av ca 130 medarbetare och är uppdelad i 13 agila team. Du kommer även ha ett brett kontaktnät både internt och externt, bland annat med applikationsteamet hos driftleverantören.
   

  

 Alecta sitter på ett fint och uppskattat kontor centralt i Stockholm, men möjligheten att jobba hemifrån finns.
   

  

**Mer om dig**
 Vi Söker Dig Som Är Kommunikativ, Analytisk Och Gillar Att Grotta Ner Dig i Detaljer. Du Arbetar Strukturerat Och Drivs Av Att Skapa Ordning. För Att Lyckas i Rollen Ser Vi Gärna Att Du Har
   

  

* Erfarenhet av produktionsplanering, drift eller releasehantering
* Kunskap i Microsoft Office, särskilt Excel.
* Är strukturerad och lösningsorienterad, med ett öga för detaljer och en förmåga att prioritera i komplexa miljöer
* Är drivande och visar på ledarskapsförmåga


 Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av ITIL, SAFe, stordatormiljö z/OS eller Azure DevOps.
   

  

**Så här får vi kontakt**
 I den här rekryteringen har vi valt att samarbeta med Ada Digital som strävar efter en transparent, inkluderande och snabbrörlig rekryteringsupplevelse. Vi vill veta mer om dig och din potential! Du söker tjänsten enkelt och behöver inte bifoga några dokument. Det räcker med en motivering till varför du söker tjänsten och om du saknar CV kan du bifoga din LinkedIn-profil. Följ sedan din ansökan live via vår hemsida. Urvalet sker löpande och tjänsten kan bli tillsatt före sista ansökningsdatum. Är du nyfiken och vill veta mer innan du söker? Hör av dig till ansvarig rekryterare. Vi ser fram emot att få kontakt med dig!

title: Teknisk projektledare
job_function: Project Management, Information Technology, and Consulting
description:
Är IT-branschen och projektledning din hemmaplan? Ser du kombinationen av att driva kundprojekt och att själv få vara med och bygga lösningarna som det bästa av två världar? Då kan detta vara nästa stora steg i din karriär! Varmt välkommen till Lime!
   

  

**Vad kommer du att göra?**
 Som teknisk projektledare ansvarar du för att driva kundprojekt som tar våra kunder till nya höjder. Du ansvarar för hela implementationsprocessen och att löpande stötta kunden under processens gång så att de får ut det mesta av sin CRM-investering.
   

  

 Mer konkret handlar det om att:
   

  

* Hålla möten och workshops för att identifiera och kravställa kundens behov
* Planera projekten och sköta dialog med eventuella tredjeparter
* Säkra projektleverans och utbilda slutanvändare
* Konfigurera och skräddarsy den tekniska kundlösningen tillsammans med Limes applikationsutvecklare


 För att lyckas krävs det att du arbetar strukturerat och målfokuserat samt är van vid att leda projekt med kunden i fokus. Projektens storlek kan variera mellan 2–18 månader och du kommer att arbeta parallellt med såväl nya projekt som långsiktiga förvaltningsprojekt med några av våra större kunder. Att bygga relation med kunderna är på så vis en central del av rollen.
   

  

 När du inte är ute på kundbesök utgår du från ett av våra Limekontor och blir en del av vår Expert Services-avdelning. Du får totalt 500 härliga kollegor runt om i Europa, varav cirka 175 tillhör Expert Services.
   

  

 Detta är en konsultroll där du kommer att jobba mot en uppsatt budget samt individuella debiteringsmål. En del av din lön (cirka 15-20%) kommer att vara rörlig och baseras på din debiteringsgrad.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
**Vem är du?**
* Du har 2-4 års erfarenhet av att projektleda mjukvaruimplementationer
* Du har ett affärstänk och en generell verksamhetsförståelse
* Du tar ägandeskap i dialog med kund och är van vid att jobba med flera olika intressenter och stakeholders
* Du kan omvandla problem, processer och behov till kreativa lösningar och konkreta förslag
* Du har en akademisk utbildning, helst inom IT
* Du talar och skriver svenska och engelska obehindrat
* Du har körkort


**Vad erbjuder vi?**
 Helt ödmjukt kan vi berätta att vi har en fantastisk kultur på Lime!
   

  

 Vi firar framgång och när vi når våra mål bjuder vi med alla kollegor på en stor sommarfest. Vi har utöver det en årlig julfest, frukost varje måndag, daglig trefika med gofika på fredagar samt wellness- och aktivitetsgrupper på respektive kontor som anordnar gemensamma aktiviteter. Vi tycker om att umgås med varandra – att ha kul och att prestera går hos oss hand i hand!
   

  

 Förutom allt detta erbjuder vi kollektivavtal, sex veckors semester, friskvårdsbidrag, pension samt stora möjligheter till personlig utveckling.
   

  

**Processen?**
 Vi tillämpar löpande urval, vilket innebär att vi driver rekryteringsprocessen kontinuerligt tills vi hittat den där handen-i-handsken-matchningen. I första steget screenar vi på din ansökan. Därefter följer intervjuer, ett praktiskt case samt referenstagning. Vår process avslutas alltid med slutintervju med vår VD Nils.

title: Solution Architect for C&IS Sub Custody at SEB
description:
Are you passionate about shaping the future of cutting-edge solutions in the financial sector? Do you thrive in an environment where innovation meets real-world challenges? If yes, then we've got an exciting opportunity for you!
   

  

**About Us**
 We are at the forefront of transformation within the C&IS Sub Custody Tribe, driving the evolution of both new and existing solutions towards our visionary target architecture. Our goal is to deliver unparalleled digital experiences that meet the ever-changing demands of our clients and leverage the latest technological advancements.
   

  

**What will you be doing?**
**Lead the Way:** 
 As a Solution Architect, you'll be instrumental in guiding our teams towards adopting and implementing our defined architecture in their daily development activities. Your expertise will serve as the compass that ensures we're always moving in the right direction.
   

  

**Build Bridges:** 
 You'll act as a trusted advisor, fostering strong partnerships with stakeholders across Business, Business Operations, and Technology. Your insights and recommendations will be crucial in aligning our architecture with the evolving needs of our Custody and Investment services.
   

  

**Drive Innovation:** 
 Join a tribe that values automation, efficiency, and regulatory compliance. You'll play a pivotal role in developing flexible, modern, and sustainable solutions that empower our customers to achieve their goals.
   

  

**Your responsibility will be to:**
* Work as a Solution Architect in the Sub Custody Tribe
* Be part of the architect team in the Custody & Investment area
* Be part of the SEB architect community and interact with other architects in relevant parts of SEB to be able to align and materialize your architecture roadmaps.


**To succeed in this role, we believe that you:**
* Have an extensive background in .NET development to enable design of solid solutions,
* At least five years of experience from working with architecture and are passionate about creating business value by establishing robust and flexible architecture that involves different technologies and platforms,
* Experience from working with Custody, Post Trade or Central Securities Depositories(CSDs)
* Enjoy working in accordance with agile methodologies for example SAFe agile framework,
* Enjoy working with both strategic architecture – scope hypothesis, defining targets and creating guidelines as well as operational architecture through creating solutions based on business needs.
* Are pragmatic in your solution ideas when you need to be and can visualize and clearly articulate consequences of various technologies and platforms (both verbally and in written form),
* Possess excellent networking and communication skills both within business and IT,
* Have a strong interest in keeping updated on the trends in the industry and technology and for the Custody & Investment area,
* Have a bachelor’s or master´s degree in a relevant field,


**It is an advantage if you have:**
* Experience of working with Google Cloud Platform


**Ready to join?**
 Attach your CV and a personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to our data-driven goals. We review applications continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2025-01-30. If you have questions about the position, please contact Lena Dahlgren lena.dahlgren@seb.se

title: Simulator Flight Instructor
description:
**Role And Responsibilities**
 For near retirement Commercial Pilots, becoming a Synthetic Flight Instructor will be a highly rewarding and satisfying transition. Drawing on your expert knowledge of Airbus systems, you will lead and mentor our clients through their training, enabling them to achieve training objectives. CAE is a world-leading training provider to commercial pilots. Our training centres provide training support solutions to a number of world-renowned airline clients. On a day-to-day basis, you will be working with a number of different organizations and nationalities. We work with the most advanced technologies in the industry and can guarantee an exciting role where no two days are the same. Due to upcoming projects, we have full-time and freelance positions available for experienced instructors in these three locations: Milan and Stockholm (SFI - A320) and Copenhagen (SFI - A350).
   

  

**Role and Responsibilities:**
* Provides simulator/ flight instruction on one single type rating for the issue of licenses, type rating and certificates or provide ground school instruction in class
* Responsible for conducting pre and post flight simulator briefings in a thorough, professional manner and in accordance with CAE standards
* Other required administrative duties (completes training records, recommends remedial training when necessary, track his/her own instructional qualifications, etc.)
* Participates in creation of curricula and courseware when required
* 40 hours per week, including weekends and holidays depending on the course schedule and sharing the work between the whole team of instructors.
* Travel to other CAE offices may be required.


**The role we are offering you:**
* Working with our airline client partners to provide high quality synthetic training on A320 (Milan/Stockholm) / A350 (Copenhagen) platforms.
* Classroom tuition including briefings, debriefings, and simulator details. Other classroom-based training may be required at times
* Concise, timely and accurate report writing, as well as maintaining up-to-date trainee records
* Flagging areas of deficiency and making recovery plans including remedial training


**You will need (SFI - A320):**
* License: EASA – SFI certificate with A320 Type Rating
* A true passion for instructing with a strong background in training
* EU Passport or the right to live and work within the EU
* Excellent English as you will work with international students.


**You will need (SFI - A350):**
* License: EASA – SFI certificate with A350 Type Rating
* Total time: Minimum of 1500 hours total time
* Time on type: Minimum of 1500 hours on Multi Crew aircraft
* A true passion for instructing with a strong background in training
* EU Passport or the right to live and work within the EU
* Good English skills are important as you will deal with many international students. Good understanding of the Scandinavian languages is an advantage as well as other language skills.


**Desirable qualities:**
* Job location: Milan / Stockholm /Copenhagen (ideally locally based candidates)
* Flight instructor certificate is valued.
* Previous instructional experience as a Line Training Captain, TRI, or TRE
* Holds an existing instructor qualification (A320/A350) or rating issued by a Regulatory Authority desirable
* An adaptable personality, with the ability to work with others to achieve the best outcomes.
* Excellent communication skills
* Excellent client focus
* Attention to detail, administration, and the ability to maintain accurate records using MS Office


 What kind of person will succeed in the role?
   

  

 Our organization is built on people who share our passion. You will be an experienced aviator who thrives on imparting your knowledge to others. When it comes to instructing, creativity and adaptability are at the forefront of our ethos. You will share in our passion and want others to succeed.
   

  

**CAE offers:**
* Excellent remuneration
* Unrivalled opportunities to progress within the organization
* The opportunity to work with the very latest in aircraft technologies
* Flexibility – and the opportunity to work alongside your current profession


**About Us**
 CAE is a global leader in modelling, simulation, and training for civil aviation. With more than 210 full-flight simulators in 42 civil training locations worldwide, CAE has the largest network of civil training locations in the industry. CAE serves approximately 3,500 airlines, aircraft operators and manufacturers across the globe. Our vision is to be the recognized global training partner of choice to enhance safety, efficiency, and readiness.
   

  

 CAE thanks all applicants for their interest. However, only those whose background and experience match the requirements of the role will be contacted.
   

  

 Equal Employment Opportunity
   

  

 At CAE, everyone is welcome to contribute to our success. With no exception.
   

  

 As captured in our overarching value "One CAE", we’re proud to work as one passionate, boundaryless and inclusive team.
   

  

 At CAE, all employees are welcome regardless of race, nationality, colour, religion, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, neurodiversity or age.
   

  

 The masculine form may be used in this job description solely for ease of reading, but refers to men, women and the gender diverse.
   

  

**Position Type**
 Regular
   

  

 CAE thanks all applicants for their interest. However, only those whose background and experience match the requirements of the role will be contacted.
   

  

**Equal Employment Opportunity**
 At CAE, everyone is welcome to contribute to our success. With no exception.
   

  

 As captured in our overarching value "One CAE", we’re proud to work as one passionate, boundaryless and inclusive team.
   

  

 At CAE, all employees are welcome regardless of race, nationality, colour, religion, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, neurodiversity or age.
